description: Manage your PocketBase collections effortlessly. Fetch, create, update, and delete records with ease, while also handling file uploads and downloads. Streamline your database operations and enhance your application's capabilities with this powerful server.

tools.name: fetch_record
tools.description: Fetch a single record from a PocketBase collection by ID.

id.description: The ID of the record to fetch.

collection.description: The name or ID of the PocketBase collection.

tools.name: list_records
tools.description: List records from a PocketBase collection. Supports filtering, sorting, pagination, and expansion.

collection.description: The name or ID of the PocketBase collection.

tools.name: create_record
tools.description: Create a new record in a PocketBase collection.

data.description: The data for the new record (key-value pairs).

collection.description: The name or ID of the PocketBase collection.

tools.name: update_record
tools.description: Update an existing record in a PocketBase collection by ID.

id.description: The ID of the record to update.

data.description: The data fields to update (key-value pairs).

collection.description: The name or ID of the PocketBase collection.

tools.name: get_collection_schema
tools.description: Get the schema (fields, rules, etc.) of a PocketBase collection.

collection.description: The name or ID of the PocketBase collection.

tools.name: list_collections
tools.description: List all collections in the PocketBase instance.

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Upload a file (provided as content string) to a PocketBase collection record field.

fileName.description: The desired name for the uploaded file (e.g., "report.txt").

recordId.description: The ID of the record to attach the file to.

fileField.description: The name of the file field in the collection schema.

collection.description: The name or ID of the collection.

fileContent.description: The raw content of the file as a string.

tools.name: download_file
tools.description: Get the URL to download a file from a PocketBase collection record field.

recordId.description: The ID of the record containing the file.

fileField.description: The name of the file field.

collection.description: The name or ID of the collection.

tools.name: set_migrations_directory
tools.description: Set the directory where migration files will be created and read from.

customPath.description: Custom path for migrations. If not provided, defaults to "pb_migrations" in the current working directory.

tools.name: create_migration
tools.description: Create a new, empty PocketBase migration file with a timestamped name.

description.description: A brief description for the migration filename (e.g., "add_user_email_index").

tools.name: create_collection_migration
tools.description: Create a migration file specifically for creating a new PocketBase collection.

description.description: Optional description override for the filename.

collectionDefinition.description: The full schema definition for the new collection (including name, id, fields, rules, etc.).

tools.name: add_field_migration
tools.description: Create a migration file for adding a field to an existing collection.

description.description: Optional description override for the filename.

fieldDefinition.description: The schema definition for the new field.

collectionNameOrId.description: The name or ID of the collection to update.

tools.name: list_migrations
tools.description: List all migration files found in the PocketBase migrations directory.

tools.name: apply_migration
tools.description: Apply a specific migration file.

migrationFile.description: Name of the migration file to apply.

tools.name: revert_migration
tools.description: Revert a specific migration file.

migrationFile.description: Name of the migration file to revert.

tools.name: apply_all_migrations
tools.description: Apply all pending migrations.

appliedMigrations.description: Array of already applied migration filenames.

tools.name: revert_to_migration
tools.description: Revert migrations up to a specific target.

targetMigration.description: Name of the migration to revert to (exclusive). Use empty string to revert all.

appliedMigrations.description: Array of already applied migration filenames.

tools.name: list_logs
tools.description: List API request logs from PocketBase with filtering, sorting, and pagination.

tools.name: get_log
tools.description: Get a single API request log by ID.

id.description: The ID of the log to fetch.

tools.name: get_logs_stats
tools.description: Get API request logs statistics with optional filtering.

tools.name: list_cron_jobs
tools.description: Returns list with all registered app level cron jobs.

fields.description: Comma separated string of the fields to return in the JSON response (by default returns all fields). Ex.:?fields=*,expand.relField.name

tools.name: run_cron_job
tools.description: Triggers a single cron job by its id.

jobId.description: The identifier of the cron job to run.

POCKETBASE_API_URL.description: The URL of your PocketBase instance.
